name: Project DeepWeb
detailed_description:
The DeepWeb. This place is beyond description — you have to see it for yourself. Something, that did not passed humanity filters. Everyone here can finally take off his mask and show himself. Friends, enemies, knowledge, ignorance, life and death — everyone here can find exactly what he searches for.

Should you search? No. If it's hided, you should not know it. In most cases it's dangerous, immoral or wild. It's unnecessary information, which was safely tucked away by caring parent for your own safety.

But sometimes someone goes too far. Throughout time there were brave men, who were traveled to places where common man never step. They believe, that among lots of pain you can find one that will provide new sounds for human hearing, and among darkness - one, that will be able to hide you from people.
But anyway, the Silent House awaits new guests.

Project DeepWeb is an absolutely new perspective on the genre of psychological horror. Puzzles are on the surface, but answers are deep inside. You're going to discover hundreds of websites, find dozens of documents, go through every Internet level — it's all to achieve your objective. And if you're brave enough to dig a little deeper, you'll see something, that was supposed to stay intact forever.

Welcome to the DeepWeb. It's a showtime!

short_description: Welcome to the DeepWeb. Here you can take off your mask and show yourself. Murders, drugs and perversions - here you can find everything you want. So breath in toxic gases and relax — the Silent House awaits new guests. It's a showtime.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512+ MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
